name: Doggo
description:
Casually walk and jump over spikes and snails in this dog-based action platformer!

Get ready to search high and low for your dog house, collecting lost dogs, hats and bones along the way. Bury your bone to create a special healing spot for future runs. Watch out for the spikes and purple snails or you will need to take a bite out of your limited dog treats!

Game Features


Online Leaderboards!
Unlock new dogs and hats to customize your character!
Use ghosts to sharpen your skills and top the leaderboards!
Lots of achievements and rewards!
